function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through wearable technology","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases and potential for widespread outbreaks","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of wearable devices, and user education on proper hygiene practices","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings for wearable devices, UV-C light sterilization","People":"Wearable technology users, healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Manufacturers, healthcare providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on wearable technology for health monitoring","Impact":"Potential for inaccurate health data and misinterpretation of symptoms, leading to delayed or incorrect treatment","Mitigation":"Validation of health data from wearables with traditional medical assessments, education on the limitations of wearable technology","Technologies":"Integration of wearable data with electronic health records, development of clinical guidelines for wearable technology use","People":"Wearable technology users, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare providers, regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Privacy and security risks with wearable technology data","Impact":"Unauthorized access to personal health information, exposure of sensitive data to malicious actors","Mitigation":"Encryption of wearable data, implementation of robust security measures, user education on data privacy and consent","Technologies":"Encryption algorithms, biometric authentication, secure data storage protocols","People":"Wearable technology users, healthcare providers, data custodians","Owner":"Manufacturers, data custodians, regulatory agencies"}]}
